item.description:
We had a very successful help2learn chinese meetup, 4 people showed up.

Everyone enjoyed each other, even one of us is starting learning Chinese. The rule is anything spoken in Chinese need to be repeated in English, so no one is left out ! Of course, once we get the conversation going, everything else will fall in place eventually ;)

Hope to see you next meetup !

Best Regards,
Edwin
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask the front desk of Nashua Public Library, or go to Hunt Conference Room and check the post schedule on its door;)
item.why: As in learning any language, practising makes it perfect, there's no substitute for it ;)
item.name: Help2LearnChinese February's 2nd-Tuesday Meetup
